welcome_message_body: "Welcome to South Whittier, a charming city known for its friendly community and beautiful parks. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that this wonderful city has to offer during your stay. Welcome to our home!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial flights and includes check-in counters, baggage claim, and boarding gates.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is for private and charter flights, providing services such as fueling, hangar rental, and pilot lounges.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo shipments and includes customs and security facilities for international shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Torrance Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Torrance Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights for major airlines such as American Airlines, Delta, and United.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for low-cost airlines such as Southwest and Frontier.

wifi.note: Wifi is free for all passengers and does not require a password.

terminals.name: Tom Bradley International Terminal
terminals.description: The largest and busiest terminal at LAX, serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Serving domestic flights for Southwest Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Serving domestic and international flights for Delta Air Lines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Serving domestic and international flights for American Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Serving domestic and international flights for American Airlines and American Eagle.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: Serving domestic and international flights for Delta Air Lines and Delta Connection.

terminals.name: Terminal 6
terminals.description: Serving domestic and international flights for Alaska Airlines, Copa Airlines, and JetBlue.

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: Serving domestic and international flights for United Airlines and United Express.

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: Serving domestic and international flights for United Airlines and United Express.

wifi.note: Limited free WiFi access is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bob Hope Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Bob Hope Airport, primarily used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Santa Monica Airport serves commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The south terminal at Santa Monica Airport serves private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 2 hours.
